Here it comes again! Election time! We in Quebec might start to get
fed up with those, but it is a necessary thing...

Here's how I'll proceed.

There's one spot open unless Roborick wants to step down, in which
case there will be two. Starting on saturday, I will take the names of
all who are suggested. Do not suggest someone on an in-game post, but
rather in a specific post, such as Suggested Candidate or Election.
The suggestion period will last one week, from july 5th to july 12th.

The election itself will begin on july 13th (assuming my schedule
allows me to) and will last one week too.

The next council will be formed of three members. The rpg is small
enough for three persons to handle correctly. However, I'm open to any
other suggestion, provided there's a suitable argument for it.

Now sorry for taking your time and create new chars so the Tripreds
can wipe the Preds out! =P
